title: My Magic Has No Attack Power - Novel Updates
tags: Apocalypse   Fantasy World   Farming   Magic   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Survival   Sword And Magic   Zombies
author: 鹦鹉精
description: One drizzly morning, the students of the D’Aire Academy graduated and the young people went their separate ways in reluctance, each seeking their own place in the world. The beginning of the adventure should have started in the tavern, but the world suddenly changed before anyone could react. Shane is a support type that is a less valued profession, but he has his own cheats. He can use magic to make bread with restorative powers and can also treat illnesses in the absence medical resources. The only disadvantage is that he has no attack power. But he still really wanted to vent. “Why would a biohazard appear in a world of magic ahh!” 《Biohazard in the World of Magic》、《Doomsday Mage》、《Surviving in the World of Magic》>
